data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Meta, Colombia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Meta, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Meta, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Meta, Colombia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Meta to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, help the fearful in Meta, Colombia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Meta, Colombia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Meta, Colombia has a population of 1,063,500.

We estimate Meta has 114,128 people who might know Jesus, 881,017 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 68,354 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,063,500 citizens of Meta, Colombia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Meta
location.cities_list: Villavicencio, Acacías, Granada, San José del Guaviare, Puerto López
